description: Check the give namespace name availability.

parameters.description: Parameters to check availability of the given namespace name

name.description: The name to check for availability

type.description: The resource type. Must be set to Microsoft.StorageSync/storageSyncServices

location_name.description: The desired region for the name check.

api_version.description: The API version to use for this operation.

subscription_id.description: The ID of the target subscription.
